tracks.text: A tanned brunette woman in pigtails lies on a beach blanket. Spray painted in orange on her back is the text, Sabrina Carpenter.
A brown haired, muscular man lies on a beach blanket. His back is sunburned in the shape of text, reading "Espresso".
He turns over, and his chest has text, reading Directed by Dave Meyers.
A young, bronzed woman looks at a row of men on the beach. She lowers her chocolate colored sunglasses.
In black and white, she drives a speed boat across a lake.
A man sits in the back with his legs up.
The woman, Sabrina Carpenter, wears a short, white dress, and star fish earrings. Her medium length blonde hair is pulled into a slight bouffant. Her eyeliner is long and pointed.
The man climbs to the front.
He kneels over her and puts his hands on her waist.
She makes a sharp turn with the boat, and he falls over board.
In otherwise black and white, she pulls an orange credit card out of a wallet and smiles.
Our view gains color.
In a white dress, she walks through the lake, away from the boat. She wears a lifesaver around her shoulders, and takes photographs showing off the wallet.
She tosses the life saver and wallet aside, dancing with the credit card.
She walks along the beach under a white and red polka dot umbrella. She wears a blue bathing suit and a coral headscarf.
She walks along the beach, then bends over, outlining her figure. 4 other women walk onto the beach in white and yellow bathing suits and heels. They carry orange bags.
Sitting in an orange pool chair, she reads a blue book.
The other women sit with her in a row, all reading books. Behind them, men in white open blue and white umbrellas.
Sabrina raises the credit card. Young men bend over the women's feet, giving pedicures. Another row of men give the women shoulder rubs.
Sabrina sits between 2 men, and drinks daintily from an orange and white cup.
The 5 women pose together.
Sabrina lies on an orange and white beach towel. A man rubs ointment along her leg. She wears 2 strips of brown ruffles as a bikini. Her bracelet and earrings are platinum.
The women lie in a row. They look back in forth in a sequence, then raise their legs.
Legs in the air, they move their ankles back in forth in sync. Young men fan them with palms. The women V shapes with their legs. The men turn away.
The women roll onto their stomachs.
She spies athletic men standing around a car.
She gets out lotion and shimmies her shoulders. The men drop their sunglasses.
She sits at the bottom of a slide, hair in pigtails, eating a melting vanilla ice cream. The other women wear bathing suits and dance with ice cream.
The men look back and forth while holding surf boards.
Sabrina smiles at them with coffee colored lips.
The men hold a surfboard like a stage and look up. Sabrina dances above them, wearing a brown, translucent one piece.
She dances in the style of riding a surfboard.
She shakes her hips while moving her arms up and down in an alternating fashion.
She dances while miming swimming. The other women lie on surf boards and look around.
The women dance in orange, bathing suits. Sabrina wears a bikini maid of sparkly netting.
Sabrina and the other women do 60's style dances on the beach.
The women switch to modern style dancing.
They shake their hips.
Sabrina places a hand over her lungs and below her waist, then curtsies.
Sabrina sits in a yellow convertible car. The car's interior has been lined in blue and filled with water. Sabrina sings to us from her pool/car.
She turns and looks concerned. The man from the boat talks to police officers.
Sabrina covers her eyes. The cops run across the beach.
She looks between her fingers. The man walks slowly towards her, behind the cops.
She closes her fingers. Nearby, the athletic men turn and watch the cops.
Sabrina slides down and hides in the pool.
Cops press women against cars, arresting them. A cop returns the orange card to the man.
A cop has her hands behind her back. He wraps his other arm around her shoulders and neck. She smiles.
He shoves her into the blue police car. She sings to us through the window.
The cop gets into the car. Sabrina sits in the back with her legs up.
